attributes.action: Call for Construction Works Off During National Lockdown by PM
attributes.additional_details:
Description: Construction work are allowed during 3rd national lockdown. They are travelling all over the place, from different city. During 3rd National Lockdown they should not be working like 1st National lockdown to reduce the spread of COVID 19.

PM should tighten the lockdown situation in England and tell Construction Workers or Company to stop working during lockdown to stop spreading the virus.
attributes.background: Construction Workers or Company to stop working during lockdown to stop spreading the virus.
